name: SenecaQuotes
0:
”Alexa, open Seneca Quotes”
”Alexa, start Seneca Quotes”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seneca quotes
des:
Hear a thought-provoking quote from Seneca, a stoic philosopher who lived in Rome during the first century AD. 
You may be surprised how much human nature has NOT changed in 2000+ years.
Maybe you can apply the wisdom to your day or share it with someone. 
These quotes are family-friendly, but an adult may need to explain their meaning to children and teenagers.
Or, to learn from kids, ask them what they think it means. 
When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. 
At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using an Amazon Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. 
We hope you find this skill enlightening.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
